test <- read.csv("C:/Projects/Titanic/test.csv", header=TRUE)
test$survived <- NA
View(test)

train <- read.csv("C:/Projects/Titanic/train.csv", header=TRUE)
train$survived <- train$Survived
train$Survived <- NULL
View(train)

full <- rbind(test, train)
full$Title <- gsub('(.*, )|(\\..*)', '', full$Name)
View(full)

# create first target cluster where we think we can get lift for a targeted model
# 1st class, adult males from the training set (survived is not NA)
cluster1 <- full[full$Pclass==1 & full$Title =="Mr" & !is.na(full$survived), ]
View(cluster1)
